title: Mother.Russia.Bleeds.Dealer.Edition.v1.0.1.(2.1.0.3)-GOG
description:
Mother Russia Bleeds (c) Devolver Digital

Release date: 09/2016          
Protection: -
Discs : 1
Game Version : 1.0.1
Genre : Action, Action, Arcade, Fighting
Language: EN/FR/DE/IT/ES/PL/PT-BR/RU

 Mother Russia Bleeds is an ultra-violent co-op brawler overflowing with an unmistakable style and unforgettably brutal action for up to four players at once. Set in an alternate U.S.S.R, the story centers on a desperate crew of imprisoned street fighters that must overcome an oppressive criminal authority and crippling drug addictions through any means necessary. Battle solo or alongside friends in an exceptional story mode campaign or harden your resolve in the savage Survival Mode.

For more info go to : https://www.gog.com/game/mother_russia_bleeds

Dealer Edition Includes:
* Mother Russia Bleeds (main game)
* Mother Russia Bleeds Documentary
* Mother Russia Bleeds Soundtrack

-Install
-Play
